meta_text: ('An Exalted Sutra of the Greater Way entitled "The Blessings of All Those Who Have Gone that Way: Gazing Upon Living Beings and Revealing the Paradises of the Buddhas" (Ārya Sarva Tathāgatādhiṣṭhāna Sattvāvalokena Buddha Kṣetra Nirdeśa Vyūha Nāma Mahāyāna Sūtra)', 'text')
